name: Storm Breakers (The Storm Rider)
description:
Surf and dodge massive breaking waves in a storm !

This is a free playable demo showing off the upcoming Unity asset I'm developing. It will contains most of you can see in this demo : playable and customizable waves from a innovative ocean model, water physics, particles effects (breaking wave, sea foam and spray, boat splash and wake), audio (wave, wind, boat splash), everything being fully procedural and customizable. This asset will be designed for gameplay, like for example survival in a storm or surfing giant waves.

To play use wasd or the arrow to control the boat and the mouse to look around. Press "return" to restart and "escape" to quit. You can try to make the tour of the buoys without capsizing, or you can try to surf huge waves. Have fun !

The demo is free, but any donation would greatly help me move further on !
